# BetterStreets Mobile Application - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
BetterStreets is a barangay community issue reporting system for Camaman-an, Cagayan de Oro City. This mobile application enables residents to report community concerns with photos, GPS location, and descriptions.

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo
- React Navigation (Tab & Stack Navigation)
- AsyncStorage for offline storage
- Expo Location for GPS
- Expo Camera/Image Picker for photos
- React Native Maps for heatmap
- Axios for API calls

## Project Structure
- `/screens` - All screen components organized by feature
- `/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/services` - API and offline storage services
- `/utils` - Helper functions and constants
- `/navigation` - Navigation configuration
- `/assets` - Images, fonts, and other static resources
